user.title: Jeedom
user.description: Connect to Jeedom and choose how entities are imported.

data_description.host: Jeedom base URL or hostname (e.g. http://192.168.1.50).
data_description.api_key: Jeedom API key (Jeedom → Settings → System → API).
data_description.name: Name shown in Home Assistant.
data_description.protocol: Transport used to talk to Jeedom (mqtt or api).
data_description.import_mode: Native creates entities inside this integration; MQTT entities uses Home Assistant’s MQTT integration.
data_description.domains: Which entity domains to create in Home Assistant.
data_description.config_path: Optional path to a config.yaml used for device filtering and overrides (same format as jeedomhub generator). Leave empty to import all devices.
data_description.use_jsonrpc: Use Jeedom JSON-RPC when executing commands.
data_description.jsonrpc_fallback: Fallback to HTTP API if JSON-RPC fails.
data_description.jsonrpc_url: Override JSON-RPC endpoint. Leave empty to use Jeedom default.
